Name: ONLY A
About the game: Inside a digital world where everything is digital, a touch to any letter can slash you into pieces. But there is a letter which doesn't hurt you.. that's letter 'A'.. thus Only A.. Gamplay Includes controls using 'W' and 'S' OR using Arrow Keys. Key Features: - Infinite Gameplay. - Easy to play... Hard to Score.
